Authors

  • Claudia Vitolo. Author, maintainer.

  • Andrew Russell. Contributor.
    This package is part of the KEHRA project and Andrew supervised the technical/software development.

  • Allan Tucker. Contributor.
    This package is part of the KEHRA project and Allan supervised the technical/software development.

  • Maëlle Salmon. Contributor.
    Maëlle Salmon reviewed the package for rOpenSci, see https://github.com/ropensci/software-review/issues/68

  • Hao Zhu. Contributor.
    Hao Zhu reviewed the package for rOpenSci, see https://github.com/ropensci/software-review/issues/68
